service-name-is-required-for-gssapi: Service name is required for GSSAPI connections
destination-port-is-required-for-ssh: Destination port is required for SSH tunnel
username-is-required-for-ssh: Username is required for SSH tunnel
host-is-required-for-ssh: Host is required for SSH tunnel
port-is-required-for-ssh: Port is required for SSH tunnel
certificate-or-password-is-required-for-: Certificate or password is required for SSH tunnel
one-server-is-required-for-servers: At least one server is required
host-and-port-is-required-for-server: Host and port is required for all server information
parse-url-error: Connection URL is not valid to parse
backup-mongodump-error: Mongodump error occurred, please check server logs
backup-mongorestore-error: Mongorestore error occurred, please check server logs
backup-mongoexport-error: Mongoexport error occurred, please check server logs
backup-mongoimport-error: Mongoimport error occurred, please check server logs
grid-fs-delete-files-error: Error occurred while deleting files, please check server logs
grid-fs-delete-file-error: Error occurred while deleting file, please check server logs
grid-fs-get-files-info: Error occurred while getting files, please check server logs
grid-fs-upload-file-error: Error occurred while uploading file, please check server logs
grid-fs-get-file-error: Error occurred while getting file, please check server logs
query-error: Query execution error occurred, please check server logs
connection-error: Connection error occurred, please check server logs
drop-all-collections-error: Drop all collections error occurred, please check server logs
schema-analyze-error: Schema anaylze error occurred, please check server logs
shell-error: Shell error occurred, please check server logs
spawn-failed: External spawn error occurred, please check server logs
subscribe-error: Subscription error occurred, please check server logs
binary-mongo-not-found: Mongo not found, please set binary path from settings
binary-mongodump-not-found: Mongodump not found, please set binary path from settings
binary-mongorestore-not-found: Mongorestore not found, please set binary path from settings
binary-mongoexport-not-found: Mongoexport not found, please set binary path from settings
binary-mongoimport-not-found: Mongoimport not found, please set binary path from settings
not-supported-os: Operating system is not supported for this operation
connection-closed: Please refresh collections or re-connect, connection has been closed
unknown-error: Unknown error occurred, please check server logs
name-same-with-old: Name should be different form previous one
recover-not-possible: You will not be able to recover it, are you sure ?
all-collections-will-be-dropped: All collections except system, will be dropped, are you sure ?
dropped-all-collections-successfully: Successfully dropped all collections/views except system
collection-will-be-dropped: __selectedCollection__ will be dropped, are you sure ?
mongo-tools-info: Nosqlclient uses mongo binaries and tools for dump/restore, schema analyzer, and shell you can set the directory of binaries from Settings
collection-will-be-wiped: __selectedCollection__'s all data will be wiped, are you sure ?
collection-or-index-name-missing: Couldn't find collection or index name, please try again
index-will-be-dropped: __indexName__ will be dropped, are you sure ?
one-stage-required: At least one stage is required
one-field-required: At least one field is required
stage-error: One of the stages has error, __error__
objects-identical: Nothing to save, all objects are identical with old result
documents-should-be-objects: All documents should be object, can not save !
save-editor-info: __deleted__ documents will be deleted, __updated__ documents will be updated and __inserted__ documents will be inserted into __selectedCollection__, are you sure ?
save-single-doc-editor-info: Document will be updated using _id field of result view, are you sure ?
delete-single-doc-editor-info: Document will be deleted using _id field of result view,  are you sure ?
no-chunks-analyzing: I rather not analyzing a GridFS collection !
not-allowed-for-ssl-connections: Unfortunately, this feature is not usable in SSL connections yet
views-cant-have-storage-engines: Views can not have storage engine !
disable-uri-to-use: Disable URI connection to use this
new-version-available: There's a new version of mongoclient: __version__, download here, if you're using docker just use pull for the __version__ or latest tag !
syntax-error-schema-analyze-result: Syntax error on schema analyze result: __error__
syntax-error-index-option-defaults: Syntax error on index option defaults: __error__
syntax-error-partial-filter-expression: Syntax error on partial filter expression: __error__
syntax-error-map-function: Map is not a valid function
syntax-error-keys-function: Keys is not a valid function
syntax-error-reduce-function: Reduce is not a valid function
syntax-error-finalize-function: Finalize is not a valid function
syntax-error-stored-function: Function to be stored is not a valid function
all-selected-files-will-be-wiped: All files that are matched by selector will be deleted, are you sure ?
existing-metadata-will-be-overriden: Existing metadata will be overwritten, are you sure ?
user_management_default_tree_text: Select a role or resource or privilege to see the details
donation_info:
We need your help ! Day by day it's getting harder to maintain an open source project and we need your help, every donated penny will be spent to the server and development costs, nothing else.
Now we accept crypto currencies
hint_info: The index to use for the query
db_stats_error: Successfully connected but couldn't fetch server stats: __error__
feature_not_supported_mongodb_version: This feature is not possible for this MongoDB version
wizard_start: Hello, let's start with giving a field name to me.
wizard_start_user: I want to retrieve documents that...
wizard_step_1: So, you want to retrieve documents that...
wizard_step_2_option_2: type your regex without starting and ending slash (/) e.g. acme.*corp
wizard_step_2_option_2_final: Cool, you can select one or more options to use with your regex, or just leave it empty and press Send
wizard_step_2_option_3: equals/not equals what ? Don't forget to provide correct type, e.g. for number 3, for string "3", for boolean true/false etc..
wizard_step_2_option_4: can you share your array, e.g. [3,5,6,8] or for string values ["myString","myAnotherString"]
wizard_step_2_option_5_6: then you should be looking for a number or date, what is it? (e.g. date("2017-01-01T13:00:00Z") or 100)
wizard_step_3_array_error: Please provide a valid array, e.g. [3,5,6,7] or ["myValue","mySecondValue"]
wizard_option_4: the field equals one of values of an array
wizard_option_5: the field is greater or equal than something
wizard_option_6: the field is greater than something
wizard_option_minus_4: the field not equals one of values of an array
wizard_option_minus_5: the field is less or equal than something
wizard_option_minus_6: the field is less than something
view_mongodb_version_warning: View option is ignored for MongoDB < 3.4
name: Name
route_not_found_detail: We couldn't find the route your're looking for !
connections_description: You can either connect an existing connection or create a new one
auth_warning: Mongodb-CR is for prior MongoDB 3.0 versions, select Scram-Sha-1 if you don't know what to do
credentials_prompt: You should enter username & password to continue connecting...
override_conn_timeout_info: Enter to override default connection timeout from settings, 0 is infinite
override_socket_timeout_info: Enter to override default socket timeout from settings, 0 is infinite
read_preference_info: Use for replica sets or sharded clusters
local_port_info: By default it's same as MongoDB port in the first tab, you can optionally set another port to here and first tab
db_name_info: You can use More - Switch Database afterwards
auth_db_placeholder: Specify if user is defined in a different DB
about_text:
Open Source Edition - Version
Licensed with AGPLv3 © 2019
Contact with info@mongoclient.com for more
admin_info: These queries can only be executed if you have necessary privileges
run_on_admin_info: If checked, this command will be executed on admin DB, otherwise on current DB
add_user_help_block: Add a user to the database
build_info_help_block: Retrieve the server information for the current instance of the db client
ping_help_block: Ping the server and retrieve results
drag_stages: Drag stages between list to re-order
findone_replace_help_block: This query replaces whole document which matched by selector with the set object
findone_delete_help_block: CAUTION: This query removes whole document which matched by selector
group_help_block: Deprecated since version 3.4 Use db.collection.aggregate() with the $group stage or db.collection.mapReduce() instead
create_index_help_block: Since mongodb version 3.0.0, this query can be used instead of ensureIndex
delete_help_block: CAUTION: This query removes whole document(s) which matched by selector
geo_haystack_search_help_block: This query executes a geo search using a geo haystack index on a collection
is_capped_help_block: Returns the information of if the collection is a capped collection
re_index_help_block: Reindex all indexes on the collection Warning: reIndex is a blocking operation (indexes are rebuilt in the foreground) and will be slow for large collections
update_many_help_block: Updates all documents which matched by Selector
server_uptime: The server is up for __uptime__ seconds
db_stats_info: The performances which are shown here are coming from serverStatus, top and stats queries. Therefore, before having a look at below graphs consider nosqlclient is already executing serverStatus at regular intervals. See here for more info
stats_info: To see the statistics of your database, simply enable show database statistics setting
connect_info: Connect to your database, by clicking Connect button
use_our_github: Use our github project for bug reports, feature requests
subscribe_info: Subscribe to Nosqlclient Newsletter by filling your e-mail address to below input, and pressing Subscribe
email_we_hate_spam: E-mail, don't worry we hate spam !
leave_empty_for_no_partial: Leave empty for no partial expression
shell_help_block: Shell command to execute, ENTER executes it, __key__ for autocompletion
db_stats_scheduler_help_block: Every configured milliseconds noqslclient populates statistic charts via querying database.
samples_count_help_block: Nosqlclient randomly finds given count data per collection selection to find autocompletion keys, 0 disables autocompletion
autocomplete_shortcut_help_block: Combination should be seperated by dash. E.g. Ctrl-Space, Alt-A. Shell also uses this combination.
single_tab_help_block: Specify to use single or multiple tabs for queries
show_db_stats_help_block: To prevent querying database at regular intervals for statistics, you can disable this feature
max_chart_points_help_block: Maximum live chart points to show on database stats
mongo_binary_path_help_block:
Set path of mongo binaries (mongo, mongodump, mongorestore, mongoexport, mongoimport) for shell, schema analyzer and dump sections
Example: /home/sercan/my_apps/mongodb3.4/bin
Make sure Nosqlclient has read permissions on the folder
toggle_mongoclient_update_help_block: Toggles Nosqlclient updates, check quick start guide
leave_empty_for_same_password: Leave this blank to keep old one
custom_data_help_block: Custom data associated with the user (only Mongodb 2.6 or higher)
user_management_info: You need to have necessary privileges
aggregate_pipeline_info:
It should be a json array.
Extended json is valid for all selectors.
operations_info: Check mongodb 3.2 bulkWrite section for more information about bulkWrite, operations must be an array
distinct_field_info: Field of the document to find distinct values for.
keys_info: An object, array or function expressing the keys to group by
condition_info: An optional condition that must be true for a row to be considered
reduce_info: The reduce function aggregates (reduces) the objects iterated
finalize_info: An optional function to be run on each item in the result set just before the item is returned
group_command_info: Specify if you wish to run using the internal group command or using eval
full_info: If checked, returns the full raw index information
docs_info: A valid extended json array, e.g. [{ key: value }]
valid_function_info: Please provide a valid function which starts with function keyword
drop_target_info: Drop the target name collection if it previously exists.
roles_info:
Array | Object
Creating a user without roles is deprecated in MongoDB >= 2.6
bypass_doc_validation_info: Allow to bypass schema validation. MongoDB 3.2 or higher.
drop_dups_info: A unique index cannot be created on a key that has pre-existing duplicate values. If you would like to create the index anyway, keeping the first document the database indexes and deleting all subsequent documents that have duplicate value
expire_info: Allows you to expire data on indexes applied to a data MongoDB 2.2 or higher
index_name_help_block: Override the autogenerated index name (useful if the resulting name is larger than 128 bytes)
include_locs_info: Include the location data fields in the top level of the results MongoDB > 2.X
unique_docs_info: The closest location in a document to the center of the search region will always be returned MongoDB > 2.X
spherical_info: Perform query using a spherical model
distance_multiplier_info: Include a value to multiply the distances with allowing for range conversions
js_mode_info: It is possible to make the execution stay in JS. Provided in MongoDB > 2.0.X
max_time_ms_info: Number of milliseconds to wait before aborting the query.
selector_info: Extended json is valid for all selectors, __key__ for autocompletion
array_filters_help: Should be a valid extended JSON array
